meanings.definition: A type of bread made with a natural yeast starter.
meanings.sent1: I baked delicious sourdoughs for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells fresh sourdoughs every morning.
meanings.sent3: The sourdoughs in the oven smelled so good, they started dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a batch of sourdoughs rising in the warm kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The secret to perfect sourdoughs is patience and a good starter.

meanings.definition: People who are experienced in a particular area, especially in the context of the Gold Rush.
meanings.sent1: The old sourdoughs shared stories of their mining adventures.
meanings.sent2: The sourdoughs in the town were respected for their knowledge of the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The sourdoughs decided to have a competition to see who could pan for gold the fastest.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom was as deep and rich as that of the seasoned sourdoughs of the Klondike.
meanings.sent5: The sourdoughs' expertise was evident in the way they navigated the treacherous terrain.
